remarks: Proof of Gödel's theorem from Löb's theorem (see comments at ~ bj-babygodel and ~ bj-babylob for details).  (Contributed by BJ, 20-Apr-2019.)  (Proof modification is discouraged.) (New usage is discouraged.)
statement:
bj-godellob.s $e |- ( ph <-> -. Prv ph ) $.
bj-godellob.1 $e |- -. Prv F. $.
bj-godellob $p |- F. $.
